quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.quote: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.quote: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.

quotes.author: Socrates
quotes.quote: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller
quotes.quote: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?

quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison
quotes.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
